name: RecycloBot!
description:
Made for Trijam 194 in 3 hours!

Exit game by pressing escape

Move with WASD keys

Hold left click to shoot towards your cursor

Hold right click to Recycle nearby fallen foes

After recycling enough enemies, your weapon will be upgraded

Upgrades can be extra bullets per shot, quicker fire rate, or extra damage

Enemies will spawn faster and faster so make sure to recycle as much as you can!

Watch out for the Dasher Bots!!!

Extra notes:

Hold the recycle button until the fallen enemy disappears to gain their parts

Getting hit by an enemy cancels your attempt at recycling

upgrades happen automatically

you can move but not shoot while recycling

You can download the desktop version to prevent lag

Figure the rest out by playing it :P
